content.question: Monetâ€™s The Saint-Lazare Station exemplifies a central interest of Impressionist artists by

choices.label: emphasizing the powerful forces of nature that overwhelm the human figures
dramatizing the tragic moments of an unfortunate event to bring about social change
rendering an everyday moment to highlight the effects of light on surfaces
including fragmented and dynamic forms to celebrate works of new technology

content.answer: rendering an everyday moment to highlight the effects of light on surfaces

topic.text: 4.1: Interactions Within and Across Cultures in Later European and American Art

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Explain how a specific work of art (or group of related works of art) demonstrates continuity and/or change within an artistic tradition, style, or practice.
